name: The Curse of Zombie Isle
body:
Hello, and welcome to The Curse of Zombie Isle.

In this game you will play John Mark, a reporter.

You are investigating a zombie infested island.

What dark, twisted secrets lie ahead?

Only you can find out, and break the curse of Zombie Isle!

***
Links
